hanzi-su-wiki:
樹

Значения

Дерево; основывать, учреждать

Мнемоника

Справа — повар, руки 寸 которого искусны, как у барабанщика 豆. Над барабаном — литавры. Дерево 木 как топливо для кухни и стройматериал.

Варианты

树, 𣗳

rtega_mnemonic:
樹樹RS
树树		tree, plant, set up, establish
  • standing 尌 tree 木
  • standing up 尌 a piece of wood 木: establish
  • ⓢ correct 对 tree 木: it stands up, it's roots have been established in the ground
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 树)
Pictophonetic: 尌 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
樹立 [ shù lì ]: to set up; to establish
樹木 [ shù mù ]: tree
樹林 [ shù lín ]: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市 , Taiwan
樹林 [ shù lín ]: woods; grove; forest
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 尌 [ shù ] to prop up; to stand something up
heisig_chinese_memo: The hippies object to trees being cut down for timber. They have glued themselves to the timber-trees and are beating their drums.
heisig_constituent: timber-trees, tree, wood, drum, samurai, beans, table, one, mouth, glue
koohiiStory1: The hippies object to trees being cut down for timber. They have glued themselves to the timber-trees and are beating their drums.
koohiiStory2: Everyone likes to see big trees fall down. For this kanji imagine hundreds of spectators glued to their chairs, then a drum roll and then a cry of "timber!!!" as the huge tree crashes to the ground.
jp_example_words:
樹木(じゅもく): trees and shrubs, arbour
樹立(じゅりつ): establish, create
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Each tree needs its drum measurement done before you can say it's really made of wood.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: There are a lot of hoodlums out there that try to dress as trees and confuse people. So make sure you measure their drum before you cut one down or tell someone your secrets under it.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you're still not sure if the tree is really made of wood, just take out a small juice (じゅ) box and start drinking it. A wooden tree will show no interest in the juice box at all.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: However! A non-wood tree will be really thirsty from pretending to be a wood tree. It will start making sounds and moving and probably say, "Can I have a juice box, please?"
Ru_Meaning: timber, trees, wood, establish, set up
Ru_Radicals: 并, 口 (рот), 土 (земля), 寸 (дюйм), 木 (дерево), 豆 (боб)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the standing (尌) trees (木) are for timber
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The hippies have glued their crotches to the timber trees in attempts to save them.

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 尌 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 尌 [ shù ] to prop up; to stand something up
①木本植物的通稱：樹木。樹林。樹大根深(喻勢力大，根基牢固)。
②種植，培育：樹藝(“藝”，種植)。樹荊棘得刺，樹桃李得蔭。
③立，建立：樹立。樹敵。
④量詞，相當於“株”、“棵”：一樹梅花。
⑤姓氏。

樹字的基本解释

樹
shù
见“树”。

樹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shù］
［《廣韻》常句切，去遇，禪。］
［《廣韻》臣庾切，上麌，禪。］
“尌1”的今字。亦作“1”。“树1”的繁体字。
(1)木本植物的总称。
(2)种植；栽种。
(3)培养；造就。参见“樹人”。
(4)树立；建立。
(5)竖，直竖。
(6)门屏，照壁。
(7)床前横木。
(8)量词。棵，株。

樹字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　樹； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页551第29
〔古文〕???【唐韻】常句切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】殊遇切，?殊去聲。【說文】生植之總名。【左傳·昭二年】季氏有嘉樹，宣子譽之。【禮·祭義】樹木以時伐焉。【淮南子·原道訓】萍樹根于水，木樹根于土。　又【爾雅·釋宮】屛謂之樹。【論語】邦君樹塞門。　又【揚子·方言】牀謂之杠。北燕、朝鮮閒謂之樹。　又獸名。【儀禮·鄉射禮】君國中射則皮樹中。【註】皮樹，獸名。謂皮作樹形以射之。　又姓也。【後魏·官氏志】樹洛于氏。後改爲樹氏。　又【唐韻】【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?臣庾切，音豎。扶樹也。【徐鍇曰】樹之言豎也。種樹曰樹。【易·繫辭】古之葬者，不封不樹。【詩·小雅】荏染柔木，君子樹之。往來行人，心焉數之。　又立也。【書·說命】樹后王君公，承以大夫師長。【泰誓】樹德務滋，除惡務本。【畢命】彰善癉惡，樹之風聲。　又諸侯之適子，天子命爲之嗣者，曰樹子。【穀梁傳·僖九年】無易樹子。　俗作?，非。

考證：〔【儀禮·鄉射禮】君國中

tree
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shù］
["Guangyun" often sentence cut, go to meet, Zen. ]
["Guangyun" Chen Yuqi, Shangzhu, Zen. ]
The present word for "尌1". Also known as "1". Traditional characters for "树1".
(1) The general term for woody plants.
(2) Planting; planting.
(3) Cultivate; bring up. See "Tree Man".
(4) Establish; establish.
(5) Upright, upright.
(6) Door screen, according to the wall.
(7) The crossbar in front of the bed.
(8) Quantifiers. Tree, plant.
tree

tree
Name meaning
Nothing.
shù
вм. 树
Radicals: 木, 壴, 寸  (tree, drum, measurement)
Meaning Mnemonic
Each tree needs its drum measurement done before you can say it's really made of wood.
There are a lot of hoodlums out there that try to dress as trees and confuse people. So make sure you measure their drum before you cut one down or tell someone your secrets under it.
Reading Mnemonic
If you're still not sure if the tree is really made of wood, just take out a small juice (じゅ) box and start drinking it. A wooden tree will show no interest in the juice box at all.
However! A non-wood tree will be really thirsty from pretending to be a wood tree. It will start making sounds and moving and probably say, "Can I have a juice box, please?"
